name: DRAGON: Game Over
description:
DESCRIPTION

DRAGON: Game Over is a game where you are a wizard that must to help a dragon to stop hitting himself with his own bouncing fireballs! Try to survive long enough and maybe he will grant you his treasure! if you do well, you can submit your time in the comments below

COMMANDS

you control a rotating purple spell created by the wizard. Control it with your mouse's cursor for avoid tthe fireballs hitting the dragon! use the space bar to change your rotation direction (left or right)

CREDITS

all of this game was created by me, Davide Pitone (in art Crip0r), exept for the wizard sprite and its animations, created by LuizMelo

a few credits' notes:

- game created with the godot game engine

-music created with beatbox

-sound effects created with jsfxr
